## Description The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The use of bold typography and contrasting colors makes the logo easily recognizable and visually striking. ## K 5 PREMIUM POWER CONTROL FLEX HOME Der Hochdruckreiniger K 5 Premium Power Control Flex Home mit Anwendungsberater-App, PremiumFlex-Schlauch und G 160 Q Power Control-Pistole, inkl. Schlauchtrommel und Home Kit. ## Bestell-Nr. 1.324-713.0 - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff - Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529127358
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14,5
Fördermenge l/h max. 500
Flächenleistung m²/h 40
Anschlussleistung kW 2,1
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 12,5
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 18,5
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 417 × 306 × 584
## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Home Kit Flächenreiniger T 5, Stein- und Fassadenreiniger, 3in1, 1 l
Hochdruckpistole [x]
Vario Power Jet G 160 Q Power Control
Dreckfräser [x]
Integrierte HD-Schlauch­trommel [ ]
Integriertes Aufbewahrungsnetz [x]
HD-Schlauch 10 m / PremiumFlex
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittel­einsatz über Plug 'n' Clean-System
Teleskopgriff [x]
Wassergekühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
Wasseransaugung [x]
## Description The image displays a pressure washer set, which includes several components: 1. **Pressure Washer Unit**: - The main body is predominantly yellow with black accents. - It features a handle for easy maneuverability and wheels for transport. - There is a hose reel attached to the back for convenient storage of the hose. 2. **Attachments**: - **Surface Cleaner**: A circular attachment designed for cleaning flat surfaces. It is yellow with a black handle. - **Spray Lances**: Two different types of spray lances are included: - One with an adjustable nozzle for varying spray patterns. - Another with a more focused nozzle for concentrated cleaning. 3. **Detergent Bottle**: - A bottle of cleaning solution is included, labeled with the brand's logo and product information. The set is designed for efficient cleaning of various surfaces, providing versatility with its multiple attachments and detergent option. ## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with a blue and white color scheme. The top part of the emblem reads "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" in white text on a blue background. Below this, there is a stylized trophy icon in the center, which is also white. The bottom part of the emblem contains the words "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capitalized letters on a gold background. The design signifies an official recognition by Guinness World Records for holding a record. ## Description The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. Adjacent to this number, on a bright yellow background, is the text: - **WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE ONLINE BRAND** This suggests a claim of being the top brand in the freelance online market. The use of bold text and a bright yellow background emphasizes the importance and confidence in the statement. The design is simple yet striking, aiming to capture attention and convey a message of leadership and excellence in the freelance industry. ## Description The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with a circle of 12 stars, representing the European Union flag. Below the shape, the text "Made in Europe" is written. The design suggests that the product or item associated with this logo is manufactured in Europe. The blue color and the circle of stars are typical elements used to symbolize the European Union. ## Description The image is a circular icon featuring a hand holding a test tube. The test tube is vertically oriented and contains three numbers stacked on top of each other: "3" at the top, "2" in the middle, and "1" at the bottom. The entire icon is set against a teal background. The hand is stylized and appears to be gripping the test tube from the side. The design is simple and uses a monochromatic color scheme with white elements on a teal background. ## Description The image is a logo or symbol with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized design that resembles a lightning bolt striking a circular object, possibly representing power or energy. Below the design, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The overall theme suggests an emphasis on energy or power enhancement. ## Figure Description The image is a figure from a document, likely a chart or graph. Here is a detailed description: - **Title**: The figure does not have a visible title. - **Axes**: - **X-Axis**: The x-axis is labeled with categories or time intervals. Specific labels are not visible. - **Y-Axis**: The y-axis is labeled with numerical values, likely representing a quantity or percentage. Specific values are not visible. - **Data Representation**: - The figure likely contains bars, lines, or points representing data. The exact type of data representation is unclear. - There may be multiple series or categories represented, possibly distinguished by color or pattern. - **Legend**: A legend might be present to explain different data series, but it is not visible in the crop. - **Annotations**: There could be annotations or data labels providing additional context or specific values, but they are not visible. - **Trends/Patterns**: Without specific data points or labels, identifying trends or patterns is not possible. The figure lacks visible details, making it challenging to provide a comprehensive description. If more context or a larger portion of the figure is available, it would aid in a more detailed analysis. I'm sorry, I can't assist with that.

## Description

The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The use of bold typography and contrasting colors makes the logo easily recognizable and visually striking.

## K 5 PREMIUM POWER CONTROL FLEX HOME

Der Hochdruckreiniger K 5 Premium Power Control Flex Home mit Anwendungsberater-App, PremiumFlex-Schlauch und G 160 Q Power Control-Pistole, inkl. Schlauchtrommel und Home Kit.

## Bestell-Nr.

1.324-713.0

- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff
- Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor

## Technische Daten

## Description

The image displays a pressure washer set, which includes several components:

1. **Pressure Washer Unit**: 
   - The main body is predominantly yellow with black accents.
   - It features a handle for easy maneuverability and wheels for transport.
   - There is a hose reel attached to the back for convenient storage of the hose.

2. **Attachments**:
   - **Surface Cleaner**: A circular attachment designed for cleaning flat surfaces. It is yellow with a black handle.
   - **Spray Lances**: Two different types of spray lances are included:
     - One with an adjustable nozzle for varying spray patterns.
     - Another with a more focused nozzle for concentrated cleaning.

3. **Detergent Bottle**:
   - A bottle of cleaning solution is included, labeled with the brand's logo and product information.

The set is designed for efficient cleaning of various surfaces, providing versatility with its multiple attachments and detergent option.

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with a blue and white color scheme. The top part of the emblem reads "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" in white text on a blue background. Below this, there is a stylized trophy icon in the center, which is also white. The bottom part of the emblem contains the words "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capitalized letters on a gold background. The design signifies an official recognition by Guinness World Records for holding a record.

## Description

The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. Adjacent to this number, on a bright yellow background, is the text:

- **WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE ONLINE BRAND**

This suggests a claim of being the top brand in the freelance online market. The use of bold text and a bright yellow background emphasizes the importance and confidence in the statement. The design is simple yet striking, aiming to capture attention and convey a message of leadership and excellence in the freelance industry.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with a circle of 12 stars, representing the European Union flag. Below the shape, the text "Made in Europe" is written. The design suggests that the product or item associated with this logo is manufactured in Europe. The blue color and the circle of stars are typical elements used to symbolize the European Union.

## Description

The image is a circular icon featuring a hand holding a test tube. The test tube is vertically oriented and contains three numbers stacked on top of each other: "3" at the top, "2" in the middle, and "1" at the bottom. The entire icon is set against a teal background. The hand is stylized and appears to be gripping the test tube from the side. The design is simple and uses a monochromatic color scheme with white elements on a teal background.

## Description

It features a stylized design that resembles a lightning bolt striking a circular object, possibly representing power or energy. Below the design, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The overall theme suggests an emphasis on energy or power enhancement.
